0.title: Establishing the Congressional Districts of the State
0.description: Redistricts state's congressional districts in accordance with U.S. Decennial Census of 2010 (plan H000C9065); reenacts related provisions; provides for applicability; repeals provisions for congressional districts superseded by act.

1.title: Legislative Apportionment & Congressional Redistricting
1.description: Creates independent commission on legislative apportionment & congressional redistricting; provides for purpose, duties, membership, & funding of commission; requires commission to employ professional staff, hold certain hearings, & transmit certain plans to Legislature for consideration; subjects commission to government-in-the-sunshine & financial disclosure requirements; prohibits persons not serving on or employed by commission from influencing or attempting to influence commission members & employees other than through prescribed processes; provides criminal penalties.

2.last_action: Laid on Table, companion bill(s) passed, see SCR 4-B (Adopted)
2.title: Adjourning & Reconvening of Legislature/2015 Special Session B
2.description: Provides for adjourning & reconvening of each house of Legislature & provides for adjournment sine die during 2015 Special Session B.

4.last_action: Signed by Officers and filed with Secretary of State
4.title: Adjourning and Reconvening of the Legislature/2015 Special Session B
4.description: Providing for adjourning and reconvening of each house of the Legislature and providing for adjournment sine die during the 2015 Special Session B, etc.

5.title: Extending the 2015 Special Session B of the Legislature
5.description: Extending the 2015 Special Session B of the Legislature under the authority of Section 3(d) of Article III of the State Constitution, etc.
